name: Electromagnetic Theory
description: Solving Poisson and Laplace equations via method of images and separation of variables, Multipole expansion for electrostatics, atomic dipoles and polarizability, polarization in dielectrics, Ampere and Biot-Savart laws, Multipole expansion in magnetostatics, magneticdipoles, magnetization in matter, Maxwellâ€™s equations in matter.
prerequisites: PHYB54H3 and PHYB21H3 and [MATA22H3 or MATA23H3] and MATB42H3 and MATB44H3
